00056 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00057 // Internal C style functions

00059 
00060 int PhysSDLFilter( const RawEvent *event );
00061 
00062 //If this is passed an event that points to 0 it will function as a method to tell us if an SDL_QUIT message has been thrown
00063 //this will return 2 if it has not seen an SDL_quit, and a 4 if it has
00064 int PhysSDLFilter( const SDL_Event *event )
00065 {
00066     static bool DroppedQuit=false;
00067 
00068     if(event!=0)                //if this is a real event
00069     {
00070         if ( event->type == SDL_QUIT )
00071         {
00072             DroppedQuit=true;   //Drop all quit events, and track that we dropped them
00073             return 0;
00074         }
00075         return 1;
00076     }else{
00077         if(DroppedQuit)         //4 if we need to make a quit event
00078         {
00079             DroppedQuit=false;  //Reset this so we don't add more in the future by accident
00080             return 4;
00081         }
00082         return 2;
00083     }
00084 }

00091 PhysEventManager::PhysEventManager(PhysWorld* ParentWorld_)
00092 {
00093     ParentWorld = ParentWorld_;
00094     PollMouseHor = false;
00095     PollMouseVert = false;
00096 }

00101 unsigned int PhysEventManager::GetRemainingEventCount()
00102 {
00103     return EventQueue.size();
00104 }
00105 
00106 PhysEvent* PhysEventManager::GetNextEvent()
00107 {
00108     if(EventQueue.size()==0)
00109     {
00110             return 0;
00111     }
00112     PhysEvent* results = EventQueue.front();
00113     return results;
00114 }
00115 
00116 PhysEvent* PhysEventManager::PopNextEvent()
00117 {
00118     if(EventQueue.size()==0)
00119     {
00120             return 0;
00121     }
00122     PhysEvent* results = EventQueue.front();
00123     EventQueue.pop_front();
00124     return results;
00125 }
00126 
00127 void PhysEventManager::RemoveNextEvent()
00128 {
00129     EventQueue.pop_front();
00130 }
00131 
00132 void PhysEventManager::AddEvent(PhysEvent* EventToAdd)
00133 {
00134     EventQueue.push_back(EventToAdd);
00135 }

00144 void PhysEventManager::UpdateSystemEvents()
00145 {
00146 
00147     this->PreProcessSDLEvents();
00148     ParentWorld->Log("WM EventCount Pending:");
00149     ParentWorld->Log(SDL_WmEvents.size());
00150     //TODO: make Physevents for each of the events in SDL_WmEvents(and delete the SDL events)
00151 }
00152 
00153 void PhysEventManager::UpdateUserInputEvents()
00154 {
00155     this->PreProcessSDLEvents();
00156     ParentWorld->Log("User Input EventCount Pending:");
00157     ParentWorld->Log(SDL_UserInputEvents.size());
00158 
00159     PhysEventUserInput* FromSDLEvent = new PhysEventUserInput();
00160     PhysEventUserInput* FromSDLPolling = this->PollForUserInputEvents();
00161 
00162     while( !SDL_UserInputEvents.empty() )
00163     {
00164         RawEvent* CurrentRawEvent = SDL_UserInputEvents.front();
00165 
00166         FromSDLEvent->AddCodesFromRawEvent( *CurrentRawEvent );
00167         delete CurrentRawEvent;
00168         SDL_UserInputEvents.pop(); //NEXT!!!
00169     }
00170 
00171     *FromSDLEvent += *FromSDLPolling;
00172     delete FromSDLPolling;
00173 
00174     if (0 < FromSDLEvent->GetMetaCodeCount())
00175     {
00176         this->AddEvent(FromSDLEvent); //Now FromSDL is some else's responsibility
00177     }else{
00178         delete FromSDLEvent;
00179     }
00180 }

00182 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00183 // Filtered management functions - You choose YAYYYY!!!
00184 ///////////////////////////////////////
00185 PhysEvent* PhysEventManager::GetNextSpecificEvent(PhysEvent::EventType SpecificType)
00186 {
00187     PhysEvent* results = 0;
00188     for(list<PhysEvent*>::iterator Iter = EventQueue.begin(); Iter!=EventQueue.end(); Iter++)
00189     {
00190         if((*Iter)->getEventType()==SpecificType)
00191         {
00192             results = (*Iter);
00193             return results;
00194         }
00195     }
00196     return results;
00197 }
00198 
00199 PhysEvent* PhysEventManager::PopNextSpecificEvent(PhysEvent::EventType SpecificType)
00200 {
00201     PhysEvent* results = 0;
00202     for(list<PhysEvent*>::iterator Iter = EventQueue.begin(); Iter!=EventQueue.end(); Iter++)
00203     {
00204         if((*Iter)->getEventType()==SpecificType)
00205         {
00206             results = (*Iter);
00207             EventQueue.erase(Iter);
00208             return results;
00209         }
00210     }
00211     return results;
00212 }
00213 
00214 void PhysEventManager::RemoveNextSpecificEvent(PhysEvent::EventType SpecificType)
00215 {
00216     for(list<PhysEvent*>::iterator Iter = EventQueue.begin(); Iter!=EventQueue.end(); Iter++)
00217     {
00218         if((*Iter)->getEventType()==SpecificType)
00219         {
00220             EventQueue.erase(Iter);
00221         }
00222     }
00223 }

00281 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00282 // Polling Functions

00284 
00285 void PhysEventManager::AddPollingCheck(const MetaCode &InputToTryPolling)
00286 {
00287     bool ItFailed = true;
00288 
00289     //Check for keyboard code
00290     if ( MetaCode::KEY_LAST > InputToTryPolling.GetCode() && InputToTryPolling.GetCode() > MetaCode::KEY_FIRST)
00291     {
00292         this->WatchKeyboardKeys.push_back(InputToTryPolling.GetCode());
00293         ItFailed=false;
00294     }
00295 
00296     //if it is a specific mouse button, then
00297     if ( MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON == InputToTryPolling.GetCode())
00298     {
00299         this->WatchMouseKeys.push_back(InputToTryPolling.GetID());
00300         ItFailed=false;
00301     }
00302 
00303     //Mouse Movement
00304     if ( MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEVERTICAL == InputToTryPolling.GetCode())
00305     {
00306         PollMouseVert = true;
00307         ItFailed=false;
00308     }
00309     if ( MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEHORIZONTAL == InputToTryPolling.GetCode())
00310     {
00311         PollMouseHor = true;
00312         ItFailed=false;
00313     }
00314 
00315     if (ItFailed)
00316         this->ParentWorld->LogAndThrow("Unsupported Polling Check on this Platform");
00317 }
00318 
00319 void RemovePollingCheck(const MetaCode &InputToStopPolling)
00320 {
00321 
00322 }

00324 
00325 PhysEventUserInput* PhysEventManager::PollForUserInputEvents()
00326 {
00327     vector<MetaCode> MetaBag;
00328 
00329     //Call the private Polling routines
00330     PollKeyboard(MetaBag);
00331     PollMouseButtons(MetaBag);
00332     PollMouseLocation(MetaBag);
00333 
00334     PhysEventUserInput* test = new PhysEventUserInput(MetaBag);
00335     return test;
00336 }
00337 
00338 //Internal private Polling routine
00339 void PhysEventManager::PollKeyboard(vector<MetaCode> &CodeBag)
00340 {
00341     if(this->WatchKeyboardKeys.size()>0)
00342     {
00343         int* KeyCount = 0;
00344         Uint8* KeyboardSnapshot = SDL_GetKeyState(KeyCount);
00345 
00346         vector<MetaCode::InputCode>::iterator iter;
00347         for(iter = this->WatchKeyboardKeys.begin(); iter != (this->WatchKeyboardKeys.end()) ; iter++)
00348         {
00349             if( *iter < MetaCode::KEY_LAST )//Is it a valid keycode
00350             {
00351                 if(KeyboardSnapshot[*iter]) // is it up or down
00352                 {//down
00353                     MetaCode temp(MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN,0,*iter);
00354                     CodeBag.push_back(temp);
00355                 }else{//up
00356                     MetaCode temp(MetaCode::BUTTON_UP,0,*iter);
00357                     CodeBag.push_back(temp);
00358                 }
00359             }
00360         }
00361     }
00362 }
00363 
00364 //Internal private Polling routine
00365 void PhysEventManager::PollMouseButtons(vector<MetaCode> &CodeBag)
00366 {
00367     if(this->WatchMouseKeys.size()>0)
00368     {
00369         vector<int>::iterator iter;
00370         for(iter = this->WatchMouseKeys.begin(); iter != (this->WatchMouseKeys.end()) ; iter++)
00371         {
00372             if(SDL_GetMouseState(NULL, NULL)&SDL_BUTTON(*iter))
00373             {
00374                     MetaCode temp(MetaCode::BUTTON_DOWN,*iter,MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON);
00375                     CodeBag.push_back(temp);
00376             }else{
00377                     MetaCode temp(MetaCode::BUTTON_UP,*iter,MetaCode::MOUSEBUTTON);
00378                     CodeBag.push_back(temp);
00379             }
00380         }
00381     }
00382 
00383 }
00384 
00385 void PhysEventManager::PollMouseLocation(vector<MetaCode> &CodeBag)
00386 {
00387     if( PollMouseHor || PollMouseVert )
00388     {
00389         int Vert=0;
00390         int Hor=0;
00391         SDL_GetMouseState(&Hor, &Vert);
00392         if( PollMouseVert )
00393         {
00394             MetaCode temp(Vert,0,MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEVERTICAL);
00395             CodeBag.push_back(temp);
00396         }
00397         if( PollMouseHor )
00398         {
00399             MetaCode temp(Hor,0,MetaCode::MOUSEABSOLUTEHORIZONTAL);
00400             CodeBag.push_back(temp);
00401         }
00402     }
00403 }
00404 
00405 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00406 // Standard interupt basd user input
00407 
00408 //This function will get all the events from SDL and Sort them into one of two Queues
00409 void PhysEventManager::PreProcessSDLEvents()
00410 {
00411     UpdateQuitEvents(); //quit skips the preprocessing Queue and goes straight into the the main Queue
00412 
00413     RawEvent temp;
00414     RawEvent* FromSDL=&temp;
00415         while(SDL_PollEvent(FromSDL))
00416         {
00417             RawEvent* ScopeHolder = new RawEvent;
00418             *ScopeHolder = temp;
00419         switch(FromSDL->type)
00420         {
00421             case SDL_ACTIVEEVENT:   //when the window gains focus
00422             case SDL_VIDEORESIZE:   //when the screen is resized
00423             case SDL_VIDEOEXPOSE:   //when the windows goes from being hidden to being shown
00424             case SDL_QUIT:          //when SDL closes
00425             case SDL_SYSWMEVENT:
00426                 SDL_WmEvents.push(ScopeHolder);
00427                 break;
00428             case SDL_KEYDOWN:
00429             case SDL_KEYUP:
00430             case SDL_MOUSEMOTION:
00431             case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONDOWN:
00432             case SDL_MOUSEBUTTONUP:
00433             case SDL_JOYAXISMOTION:
00434             case SDL_JOYBUTTONDOWN:
00435             case SDL_JOYBUTTONUP:
00436             case SDL_JOYBALLMOTION:
00437             case SDL_JOYHATMOTION:
00438                 SDL_UserInputEvents.push(ScopeHolder);
00439                 break;
00440             case SDL_USEREVENT://Never thrown by SDL, but could be added by a user
00441             default:
00442                 throw ("Unknown SDL Event Inserted");
00443                 break;
00444         }
00445         }
00446 }
00447 
00448 void PhysEventManager::UpdateQuitEvents()
00449 {
00450     if (NULL == SDL_GetEventFilter())           //Verify the Event filter is installed, if not, then install it.
00451     {
00452         SDL_SetEventFilter( PhysSDLFilter );
00453     }else{
00454         if(4==PhysSDLFilter(0))                 //Pass it a null pointer to get it to "Not Callback Mode"
00455         {
00456             this->AddEvent(new EventQuit());    //We need to make a quit event
00457         }else{
00458             //all clear
00459         }
00460     }
00461 }
